mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_state,Location,board_no,writer,title,content,password,board_date, board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3,board_img4,board_img5,board_img6,board_img7,board_img8,board_img9) VALUES('shuttle','P',(select ifnull(max(BOARD_NO+0),0)+1 from board a where board_state = 'shuttle'),#{writer},#{title},#{content},#{password},now(), 'null','null','null','null','null','null','null','null','null','null')
mapper.select: SELECT board.board_no boardNo, board.writer as writer, board.title as title, DATE_FORMAT(board.board_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as boardDate, board.board_reply as boardReply FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS rnum , t.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R, (SELECT board_no,writer,title,board_Date,board_reply FROM (SELECT board_no,writer,title,board_Date,board_reply from board where board_state='shuttle' and location='P' order by board_no+0 desc) a ) t) board where rnum BETWEEN ((#{curPage}-1)*10)+1 AND #{curPage}*10
select count(board_no) from board where board_state='shuttle' and location='P'
SELECT * FROM board WHERE board_state='shuttle' and location='P' and board_no=#{boardNo} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} AND board_state='shuttle' and location='P'
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title},writer=#{writer},content=#{content}, password=#{password} WHERE BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} AND board_state='shuttle' and location='P'
